resources.string: This class demonstrates launching a standard knowledge base article display. No chat button will be available.
This class demonstrates launching a standard knowledge base search window. No chat button will be available, and articles will be displayed within your application.
This class demonstrates launching a standard knowledge base search window. A chat button will always be available, and articles will be displayed within your application.

This class demonstrates launching a standard knowledge base search window. A chat button will only be shown if an operator is online, and articles will be displayed within your application. If no operator is available a custom button will be shown that opens an email dialog.
